subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Premier League leader, Manchester United, dropped points in the title race with a 1-1 draw at Swansea on Sunday, while Chelsea routed Aston Villa, 8-0.
snippet: The Premier League leader, Manchester United, dropped points in the title race with a 1-1 draw at Swansea on Sunday, while Chelsea routed Aston Villa, 8-0.
